00048     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00049     PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRaw::PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRaw(PagingLandScapeData2DManager *dataMgr)
00050     : PagingLandScapeData2D(dataMgr)
00051     {
00052         mShadow = 0;
00053         mMaxheight = mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00054     }  
00055     //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00056     const Real PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRaw::getMaxAbsoluteHeight(void) const
00057     { 
00058         return mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00059     }

00065     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00066     const Real PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRaw::getShadow (const Real mX, const Real mZ,
00067                                                             const bool &positive)
00068     {
00069         if (mShadow)
00070         {
00071             unsigned int Pos = static_cast<unsigned int> ((mZ * mShadow->getWidth() + mX) * 3);//3 bytes (mImage is RGBA)
00072             if (mShadow->getSize () > Pos)
00073             {
00074                 if (positive)
00075                     return static_cast<Real> (mShadow->getData()[ Pos + 0]) / 255;
00076                 else
00077                     return static_cast<Real> (mShadow->getData()[ Pos + 1]) / 255;
00078             }
00079             else
00080             {
00081                 return 0.0f;
00082             }
00083         }
00084         else
00085         {
00086             return 0.0f;
00087         }
00088     }
00089     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00090     void PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRaw::_save()
00091     {
00092         uchar *data = new uchar[ mXDimension * mZDimension * 2 ];   
00093 
00094         const double divider = 65535.0 / mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00095         
00096         unsigned int j = 0;
00097         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mMaxArrayPos; i++)
00098         {             
00099             const ushort syn = ushort  (mHeightData[i] * divider);
00100             #if OGRE_ENDIAN == OGRE_ENDIAN_BIG
00101                 data[j] = uchar ((syn >> 8) & 0xff);
00102                         data[j+ 1] = uchar (syn & 0xff);
00103             #else
00104                         data[j] = uchar (syn & 0xff);
00105                         data[j+ 1] = uchar ((syn >> 8) & 0xff);
00106             #endif
00107             j += 2;            
00108         }
00109 
00110         const String fname = mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_filename + "." +
00111                                     StringConverter::toString(mPageZ) + "." +
00112                                                 StringConverter::toString(mPageX) + ".";
00113         const String extname = mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension;
00114 
00115         FileInfoListPtr finfo =  ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().findResourceFileInfo (
00116                 mParent->getOptions()->groupName, 
00117                 fname + extname);
00118                 //ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().openResource ()
00119         FileInfoList::iterator it = finfo->begin();
00120         if (it != finfo->end())
00121             {
00122                 //FileInfo *inf = &(*it);
00123                 char *olddir = ChangeToDir (const_cast< char * > (((it)->archive->getName()).c_str()));
00124                 //FileSystemArchive::pushDirectory()
00125                 
00126                 std::ofstream outfile;
00127                 String FileNameRaw;
00128                 
00129                 DataStreamPtr image_chunk(new MemoryDataStream ((void*)data,
00130                             mXDimension * mZDimension * 2 * sizeof (uchar), 
00131                             true)); 
00132          outfile.open (const_cast< char * > ((fname + "modif." + extname).c_str()),
00133                                 std::ios::binary);
00134                 // Write out
00135                 outfile << image_chunk->getAsString ();
00136                 outfile.close ();
00137 
00138 
00139                 //FileSystemArchive::pushDirectory();
00140                 RetablishDir (olddir);
00141             }
00142     }
00143     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00144     bool PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRaw::_load(const unsigned int mX, const unsigned int mZ)
00145     {
00146         // Load data
00147         const String strFileName = mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_filename + "." + 
00148                             StringConverter::toString(mZ) + "." +
00149                                         StringConverter::toString(mX) + ".";
00150 
00151         String finalName = strFileName + 
00152                         "modif." + 
00153                         mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension;
00154 
00155         if (!(mParent->getOptions()->Deformable && 
00156             ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(mParent->getOptions()->groupName,finalName)))
00157         {    
00158             finalName = strFileName + mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension;   
00159             if (!ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(mParent->getOptions()->groupName,finalName))
00160             { 
00161                 LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(String("PLSM2 : Cannot find map named ") + finalName, 
00162                     LML_CRITICAL,
00163                     true);
00164                 return false;
00165             }
00166         }
00167 
00168         DataStreamPtr RawData;
00169         RawData = ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().openResource(finalName, 
00170                     mParent->getOptions()->groupName);
00171 
00172       
00173         // Validate size
00174         // Image size comes from setting (since RAW is not self-describing)
00175         // here 16 bits Raw file
00176         mXDimension = mSize;
00177         mZDimension = mXDimension;
00178         mBpp = 2;
00179         mMaxArrayPos = static_cast <unsigned int> (mSize * mSize);
00180         const size_t numBytes = mMaxArrayPos * mBpp;
00181         if (RawData->size() != numBytes)
00182         {
00183             OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00184                 "RAW size (" + StringConverter::toString(static_cast<unsigned int> (RawData->size())) + 
00185                 ") does not agree with configuration settings.", 
00186                 "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRaw::_load");
00187         }
00188                 mMax = static_cast<unsigned int> (numBytes) + 1;
00189 
00190         mHeightData = new Real[mMaxArrayPos];
00191         const double scale = (double) mParent->getOptions()->scale.y / 65535;
00192         mMaxheight = 0.0f;
00193 
00194         MemoryDataStream dc (RawData, 
00195                                                 true);
00196         const uchar *pSrc = dc.getPtr ();   
00197 
00198         unsigned int j = 0;
00199         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mMax - 1;  i += mBpp)
00200         {
00201             #if OGRE_ENDIAN == OGRE_ENDIAN_BIG
00202                         ushort val = *pSrc++ <<8;
00203                         val += *pSrc++;
00204             #else
00205                         ushort val = *pSrc++;
00206                         val += *pSrc++ <<8;
00207             #endif
00208             const Real h = val * scale;
00209             mMaxheight = std::max (h, mMaxheight);
00210             mHeightData[j++] = h;
00211         }
00212 
00213     
00214         if (mParent->getOptions()->vertex_shadowed)
00215         {
00216             mShadow = new Image();
00217             mShadow->load(mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_filename +
00218                             ".HS." +
00219                             StringConverter::toString(mZ) + "." +
00220                             StringConverter::toString(mX) + "." +
00221                             "png", 
00222                             mParent->getOptions()->groupName);
00223                             //mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension);
00224         }
00225         return true;
00226     }
00227 
00228     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00229     void PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRaw::_load()
00230     {
00231         // Load data
00232                 const PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt =  mParent->getOptions();
00233                 const String mName(opt->LandScape_filename + "." + opt->LandScape_extension);
00234                 const String gName (opt->groupName);
00235                 ResourceGroupManager *rsm = ResourceGroupManager::getSingletonPtr();
00236         DataStreamPtr RawData = rsm->openResource(mName, gName);
00237 
00238         // Validate size
00239         // Image size comes from setting (since RAW is not self-describing)
00240         // here 16 bits Raw file
00241 
00242         mXDimension = opt->RawWidth;
00243         mZDimension = opt->RawHeight;
00244 
00245         mBpp = 2;
00246         
00247         const size_t sourceHeight = mZDimension;
00248         const size_t sourceWidth = mXDimension;
00249 
00250         computePowerof2PlusOneSize ();       
00251                 mSize = mXDimension;
00252 
00253         if (RawData->size() != sourceHeight*sourceWidth*2)
00254         {
00255             OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00256                 "RAW size (" + StringConverter::toString(static_cast<unsigned int> (RawData->size())) + 
00257                 ") does not agree with configuration settings.", 
00258                 "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRaw::_load");
00259         }
00260     
00261         mMaxArrayPos = static_cast <unsigned int> (mXDimension * mZDimension);
00262         const size_t numBytes = mMaxArrayPos * mBpp;
00263                 mMax = static_cast<unsigned int> (numBytes) + 1;
00264 
00265         mHeightData = new Real[mMaxArrayPos];
00266         const Real scale = opt->ScaledHeightY;
00267         mMaxheight = 0.0f;
00268 
00269 
00270         MemoryDataStream dc(RawData, 
00271             true);
00272         const uchar *pSrc = dc.getPtr ();     
00273 
00274         const unsigned int shift_fill = static_cast <unsigned int> (mXDimension - sourceWidth);
00275         unsigned int dest_pos = 0;
00276         //for some reason water is 65035 in SRTM files...
00277         const bool srtm_water = opt->SRTM_water;
00278         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < sourceHeight; ++i)
00279         {
00280             for (unsigned int j = 0; j < sourceWidth; ++j)
00281             {
00282                 #if OGRE_ENDIAN == OGRE_ENDIAN_BIG
00283                             ushort val = *pSrc++ << 8;
00284                             val += *pSrc++;
00285                 #else
00286                             ushort val = *pSrc++;
00287                             val += *pSrc++ << 8;
00288                 #endif
00289 
00290                 if (srtm_water && (val - 65035) > 0)
00291                     val = 0;
00292 
00293                 const Real h = val * scale;
00294                 mMaxheight = std::max (h, mMaxheight);
00295                 mHeightData[dest_pos++] = h;
00296             }
00297             memset (&mHeightData[dest_pos], 0, shift_fill);
00298             dest_pos+= shift_fill; 
00299         }        
00300     }
00301     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00302     void PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRaw::_unload()
00303     {   
00304         delete mShadow;
00305         mShadow = 0;
00306     }
00307 } //namespace
